original_text: Thou shalt fall upon the mountains of Israel, thou, and all thy bands, and the people that is with thee: I will give thee unto the ravenous birds of every sort, and to the beasts of the field to be devoured.
korean_text: 너와 네 모든 무리와 너와 함께 있는 백성이 다 이스라엘 산 위에 엎드러지리라 내가 너를 각종 사나운 새와 들짐승에게 넘겨 먹게 하리니

sentences.original_text: Thou shalt fall upon the mountains of Israel,
and the people that is with thee:
I will give thee unto the ravenous birds of every sort,
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너를 온갖 사나운 새들에게 주리라.

sentences.original_text: and to the beasts of the field
